channel.title: Online Banking
channel.description:
I haven't been able to find a banking program that I really like, so I decided to make my own. Everything is working as expected, and I was looking to make it even easier to use. What I'm trying to add now is getting the transaction data from my banks server. I've seen different types of back-ends used (OFX Direct Connect and HBCI), but I can't find the source code anywhere.
Does anyone know where I can find, or where I can learn about requesting transaction data?

item.title: Online Banking
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Ill go way ahead of you Davidi XD. Yours was nothing.

Use MoparCoins to buy titles, which could then mean respect. You only get MoparCoins by helping peope or, when mods see that you have earned them. Another possibility would be a R-S kind of thing and donate for them.

Make titles such as “The Richest” “God Mode” “Im fucking baws” “Pro” “Perfection” “Developer” “Bloody Anus”

LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Online Banking
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:428147”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=530835.msg3877086#msg3877086 date=1325744904]
Emulated bank environment/currency software is something I’ve always wanted to create…

It would be cool to have like ‘Moparcoins’ or something haha

EDIT - Sorry for offtopic
[/quote]

If something like that existed, then the forums would turn into a battle over who has the most (kind of like rep)[/quote]Just like money in real life! Except we could actually have a use for it, instead of it just being a status symbol Getting way ahead of myself but yea…

Read full topic
